name: ROS
description: ROS - is a logical game game. You must hold the ball before moving to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
